p: Antibodies used in this study are: anti-pan-flavivirus (MAB10216, clone D1-4G2) anti NeuN (Abcam), anti Iba-1 (Abcam), anti Tau (Abcam), anti-GFAP (Abcam), anti-caspase 3 and anti-activated caspase 3 (Cell Signalling Technology) and secondary antibodies coupled to Alexa dyes (488, 555 or 647, Thermofischer Scientific).
